short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An effective tool for analyzing revenue, prices and product stocks of competitors on Noon and Amazon.ae

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sellscreen.io - a sales analysis tool for Amazon.ae and Noon (UAE and KSA). This extension provides data on sales/revenue, prices, and stock for the past month. It works on product pages. No registration required.

Note: For Amazon.ae, revenue is shown only for offers from sellers with delivery from the UAE.
